original_text: It was not easy to keep the city safe. Then God put an idea in my mind. I called the leaders, the officers and the other people to meet together. I wanted to check the lists of their families. I found the list of those people who had first returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 내 하나님이 내 마음을 감동하사 귀족들과 민장들과 백성을 모아 그 계보대로 등록하게 하시므로 내가 처음으로 돌아온 자의 계보를 얻었는데 거기에 기록된 것을 보면

sentences.original_text: It was not easy to keep the city safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 도시를 안전하게 지키는 것은 쉽지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then God put an idea in my mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님께서 제 마음에 아이디어를 넣어주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: I called the leaders, the officers and the other people
sentences.korean_translation: 저는 지도자들, 관리들과 다른 사람들을 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: I wanted to check the lists of their families.
sentences.korean_translation: 저는 그들의 가족 목록을 확인하고 싶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: I found the list of those people
who had first returned to Jerusalem.
